full_summary:
===============

**Port Morien Inner Shoreline Repairs Invitation to Qualify**
----------------------------------------------------------

Reference Number | WS3814180252-Doc3814216522

**Solicited through Competitive Bidding**
----------------------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to participate in the **Invitation to Qualify** for the Port Morien Inner Shoreline Repairs project.

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

*   UN/cess: 72000000, 72100000, 72102905, 72103300, 72141200
*   Procurement Category: Construction (CNST)
*   Procurement Method: Competetive - Selective Tendering
*   Contracting Entity: PSPC
*   End User: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

**Evaluation Criteria and Process**
------------------------------------

A two-phase selection process will be used to evaluate the contractors. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested contractors. The second phase will invite the qualified contractors to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

**Bidding Submission and Deadline**
---------------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 19, 2023, 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Important Notes**
------------------

*   The qualification list will expire within 60 days or upon award of a contract in the second phase, whichever is earlier.
*   The pre-qualification list will not be used in any other solicitation.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

Nova Scotia, Canada

**Contracting Entity Contact**
-----------------------------

*   Name: Beausoleil, Timothee (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Phone: Not available
*   Fax: Not available

**Notice URL and Attachments**
-----------------------------

*   Ariba Discovery: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15043305?extsite=MTUwNDMzMDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15043305?extsite=MTUwNDMzMDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA
